document.full_text: a cosmic collision brings the end to all life in "melancholia," a grand cinematic vision from danish maverick director lars von trier that had the cannes film festival buzzing with excitement on wednesday.
document.title: film of cosmic chaos, end of earth wows cannes
lines_and_colors: a cosmic collision brings the end to all life in "melancholia," a grand cinematic vision from danish maverick director lars von trier that had the cannes film festival buzzing with excitement on wednesday.
